name: declassified
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
officially stated to no longer be secret: The lawsuit is based heavily upon recently declassified CIA documents. I looked through the declassified files held by the Washington-based National Security Archive.
More examplesFewer examplesThey cited testimony from a declassified Canadian intelligence report.They were thwarted in part by a US intelligence campaign, the declassified files reveal.The book was written by a professional historian who has pored over volumes of recently declassified information.a declassified account of the development of the hydrogen bomb
